ygData.subject: skill cieling per class goes like this......
ygData.msgSnippet: its only in regards to combat so only combat gets effected by these cieling changes otherwise all skills are 5 + (5*lvl)........ok so for pure casters combat
ygData.messageBody:
its only in regards to combat so only combat gets effected by these cieling
changes otherwise all skills are 5 + (5*lvl)........ok so for pure casters
combat skills go up 3 + (3*lvl)......for preist classes its 4 and for tanks
and hybrids fighters its 5......so an example would be a 6th lvl enchanter
could have 35 divination and other magics but only a 21 maxed out combat
skill.......or a 10th lvl Druid could have 55 Conjuring but would only have
44 1handed slashing......good?



Neurosiz
